# Module: tf.layers

### Module `tf.layers`



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/layers/layers.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.1/tensorflow/python/layers/layers.py).

This library provides a set of high-level neural networks layers.


## Functions

[`average_pooling1d(...)`](../tf/layers/average_pooling1d): Average Pooling layer for 1D inputs.

[`average_pooling2d(...)`](../tf/layers/average_pooling2d): Average pooling layer for 2D inputs (e.g. images).

[`average_pooling3d(...)`](../tf/layers/average_pooling3d): Average pooling layer for 3D inputs (e.g. volumes).

[`batch_normalization(...)`](../tf/layers/batch_normalization): Functional interface for the batch normalization layer.

[`conv1d(...)`](../tf/layers/conv1d): Functional interface for 1D convolution layer (e.g. temporal convolution).

[`conv2d(...)`](../tf/layers/conv2d): Functional interface for the 2D convolution layer.

[`conv2d_transpose(...)`](../tf/layers/conv2d_transpose): Transposed convolution layer (sometimes called Deconvolution).

[`conv3d(...)`](../tf/layers/conv3d): Functional interface for the 3D convolution layer.

[`dense(...)`](../tf/layers/dense): Functional interface for the densely-connected layer.

[`dropout(...)`](../tf/layers/dropout): Applies Dropout to the input.

[`max_pooling1d(...)`](../tf/layers/max_pooling1d): Max Pooling layer for 1D inputs.

[`max_pooling2d(...)`](../tf/layers/max_pooling2d): Max pooling layer for 2D inputs (e.g. images).

[`max_pooling3d(...)`](../tf/layers/max_pooling3d): Max pooling layer for 3D inputs (e.g. volumes).

[`separable_conv2d(...)`](../tf/layers/separable_conv2d): Functional interface for the depthwise separable 2D convolution layer.
